name: Heist (itch) (unionpros)
description:
Sneak into a museum and steal the most valuable art pieces from it.  Watch out for obstacles that will block your path and find your way around them.  Once you steal the art piece, you must hurry and escape before the time limit runs out.  New traps will appear when you steal the art that will hinder your escape.

Members:

Michael Clarke -- Creative Director and Lead Programmer

Marvin Paz -- UI

Donovan Maholland -- Environmental Artist

Alex Nichiporuk -- Character Artist
